intro_html:
Upload a CSV or Excel file containing a column with territorial codes and a numeric column to visualize.

After selecting the visualization and classification parameters, a downloadable thematic map (PDF, PNG, JPG) will be generated.

You can also load inset_grid.topojson to overlay the inset grid (useful for overseas territories, small islands or areas manually shifted into dedicated boxes).
upload_label: Upload a CSV or Excel file
excel_empty_error: The Excel file contains no sheets with data.
